casebody.data:
STATE
v.
George Lee NOBLES 34PA14-2 Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 28, 2018 Anne M. Gomez, Assistant Appellate Defender, for Nobles, George Lee Kathleen N. Bolton, Assistant Attorney General, Amy Kunstling Irene, Special Deputy Attorney General, Michael Bonfoey, District Attorney, for State of N.C.

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 28th of December 2018 by Defendant:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 28th of December 2018."

Defendant shall have up to and including the 4th day of February 2019 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
